pages.text: $(l)INFORMATION: $(br)$()The Alphem King is one of the strongest and hardest bosses in Bioplethora. It can shoot a large row of giant explosives continuously, it's smashes gives off a devastating blow to the ground and it's targets, and it's roars calls multiple Alphems to fight alongside it. It also has a few defensive skills like regenerative barriers that cancels any attack, constant regeneration, and the ability to jump back for a quick retreat.
The Alphem King is summonable by shooting a Wind Arrow on a Alphanum Nucleus. Check out $(l:nucleus_awakening)Alphanum Nucleus Awakening$().
